title: Roadmap
content:
Achievements, Weapons, armor and tool effects.

This is a roadmap for the future of Idle Worker. The game is still in development, and these features will be added in the future.

title: Version 0.21
content:
🛠 Added new tools
🔥 Improved performance
🐛 Fixed fighting bug

title: Version 0.20
content: 🚀 Initial release with crafting, jobs and upgrades!
